bug.author: v-yunbin
bug.summary: Increasing ASR performance throught retraining rnn lm model with adding more text corpus
bug.description:
Hi developers: After finished train model( alias model_v1), I try to retrain rnn lm with adding 1000w utterance text (alias model_v2) . I compare the results on the two models and it seems just have a little gain. `
model CER
model_v1 48.83%
model_v2 48.18%
` i want to know whether my thinking is right ï¼Ÿ or any suggests. thanks
